ZConnect is an upcoming platform which will revolutionize your way of interaction with the community. ZConnect is the online equivalent of any community in which people live together, be it your college, your company, or your locality. ZConnect gives you the power to interact virtually with the people in your community, using ZConnectâ€™s simplified interface. Get alerts on the latest events, updated contacts, offers from shops and second-hand products on sale in your community.
